author: Vinaykumar Patil
title: 5-day Cyclone warning in Karnataka: 23 districts on Yellow alert, heavy downpour with thunderstorms predicted
text: The State Meteorological Department has issued a warning for a cyclonic circulation affecting 23 districts of Karnataka over the next five days, with heavy rain, thundershowers, and gusty winds expected. Residents and authorities are advised to take precautions and stay updated with weather forecasts to manage any emergencies effectively. The State Meteorological Department has issued a warning for a cyclonic circulation expected to impact 23 districts of Karnataka over the next five days. South Kerala and neighbouring Karnataka are expected to bear the brunt of the storm. Friday, May 10: On Friday, May 10th, several districts are anticipated to experience heavy rain and thundershowers accompanied by gusty winds. Chikmagalur, Mysore, Kodagu, and Hassan districts are likely to be the most affected, with winds reaching speeds of 40-50 kmph. Moderate rain and thundershowers are expected in other districts such as Bangalore Rural, Bangalore City, and Shimoga. Saturday, May 11: Saturday, May 11th, is predicted to bring heavy rain to Kodagu, Chikkamagaluru, and Shimoga districts, with winds gusting up to 50 kmph. Uttara Kannada, Udupi, and Dakshina Kannada districts are also likely to experience heavy rainfall. Other districts can expect moderate rain and thundershowers, with wind speeds ranging from 40-50 kmph. Sunday, May 12: On Sunday, May 12th, Vijayapur, Kalaburgi, Bidar, and other districts may witness heavy rain and thundershowers, accompanied by gusty winds. The coastal districts of Uttara Kannada, Udupi, and Dakshina Kannada are also expected to receive heavy rainfall. Moderate rain is forecasted for several other districts, along with gusty winds. Monday, May 13: Monday, May 13th, is likely to bring heavy rain to Kodagu, Chikkamagaluru, Mysore, and several other districts, with gusty winds. Additionally, Uttara Kannada, Udupi, and Dakshina Kannada districts are expected to experience heavy rainfall. Other districts may see scattered thundershowers. Tuesday, May 14: On Tuesday, May 14th, moderate rain with thundershowers is anticipated in many districts, with wind speeds ranging from 40-50 kmph. Coastal districts may receive light to moderate rain. Precautions: Residents of the affected districts are advised to take necessary precautions and stay updated with weather forecasts. Authorities are also urged to be prepared to manage any emergencies that may arise due to adverse weather conditions. With the State Meteorological Department's warning in place, residents and authorities alike must stay vigilant and prepared for the upcoming severe weather conditions.

author: sotillo
title: #23 Una violenta proisraelí que se quiere hacer famosa tras agredir en Madrid a un joven que repartía panfletos contra el genocidio
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#1](c1#c-1) Una cristiana de derechas de bien... Lo más alejado de las enseñanzas de Jesucristo que se pueda uno imaginar.
Cuanta mierda a dos patas sobre el planeta joder.
[#1](c1#c-1) pues quizás alguien le tendría que explicar a esta... chiquilla... que algunos de los que defiende, no la verían con buenos ojos si fuera a Jerusalén a los lugares de culto cristianos.
https://www.ayudaalaiglesianecesitada.org/noticias/ataques-contra-cristianos-en-israel/
De todas formas, si veo a unos chavales repartiendo pasquines, y no me va su rollo... Mejor pasar que hacer el garrulo como esta... chica. Hace falta ser gilipollas para montar semejante numerito.
Otra sionazi con las neuronas justas para no cagarse encima y con unas características propias de la endogamia genética que te puedes encontrar en los peces de un acuario.
Bueno, puede que me equivoque. Por la mierda de sus argumentos y su modo de actuar esta claro que debe llevar el pañal desbordando mierda.
[#4](c4#c-4) No me considero violento, pero si me da como le ha dado al activista se la devuelvo aplicando la doctrina sionista de "mil ojos del oponente por cada ojo amigo".
No puedo soportar un nivel de subnormalismo tan alto y encima henchido de razón.
"A ver la nazi esta", "venga la nazi", "eres una genocida", "apoyas a genocidas que matan a niños", "fuera, fascista, fuera, fascista", "no, pero yo lo voy a grabar, no voy a difundirlo pero esto va a quedar grabao porque esta señora me ha agredido dos veces [...]".
"Vete tú a palestina con las pintas que llevas", "payaso, memo", "sin cultura, sin estudios y sin vergüenza", "te vas a reír de tu puta madre".
Duelo dialéctico entre colosos intelectuales.
[#3](c3#c-3) Para señalarla, no vaya ser que crea que no pasa nada por agredir y defender un genocidio y lo vuelva a hacer o que otros la copien.
[#11](c11#c-11) Pero fíjate lo que insiste en la violación de mujeres. Supongo que en su escala de valores una violación es peor que asesinar a niños.
Al final los extremos se tocan.
Los de Hamas son terroristas pero Israel está cometiendo un genocidio.una cosa no quita la otra. Estar en contra de Israel no es estar a favor de Hamas.

author: 記者陳郁柔／台北報導
title: 屏東台電核三廠火警！現場黑煙狂竄 台電：不影響發電及爐心安全 | 生活焦點 | 要聞 | NOWnews今日新聞
text:
核電廠再傳祝融肆虐！今（6）日上午，台電屏東恆春鎮第三核能發電廠驚傳火警，根據了解，現場竄出大量濃煙，傷亡和起火原因不明，屏東縣消防局獲報並派員前往，趕抵現場後，初步了解為廢棄空壓機廠房後方兩座冷卻水塔起火。
我是廣告 請繼續往下閱讀 對於此次火警，台電表示，今日上午11時23分接獲通報，核三廠空壓機廠房南側發生冷卻水塔(地面直立，直徑3米、高度3米，塑膠材質)火警事件，不影響發電及爐心安全。廠內消防隊迅速展開滅火行動，並於11時35分撲滅火勢，現場狀況已受到控制。
空壓機廠房距離2號機約50公尺，不會影響機組安全，輻射亦無外洩之疑慮，請民眾放心。
消防局指出，6日早上11點23分機接獲民眾報案，指出在恆春鎮核三廠內有冒出大量黑煙，立刻派出大批人馬趕往救援，抵達現場後，初步了為廢棄空壓機廠房後方兩座冷卻水塔起火，且火勢已獲控制，沒有安全疑慮；11點41分火勢撲滅，由場內消防隊持續進行降溫，後續確認為燃燒廢棄品，並無危險物品，事發原因初判為現場施工切割廢棄鐵材時不慎引起。
核三廠火災　台電：11時35分撲滅火勢、不影響發電及爐心安全 屏東台電核三廠火警！現場黑煙狂竄　消防人車急馳援「傷亡不明」 確保供電穩定！台電鳳山區營業處舉行加強穩定供電作為宣誓 中正、萬華停電　台電：影響7607戶、20時30分全面復電 關鍵字 核電廠 火警 屏東 恆春鎮 台電

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Adopt two kittens for one fee at Woods Humane
text:
By News Staff ,
8 hours ago More than 20 kittens currently available – Woods Humane Society will hold a two-day adoption promotion to help kittens find homes on Sept. 21 and 22 at both of its locations. The “Doublemint Kitten Combo” event allows adopters to take home two kittens for the price of one. The standard kitten adoption fee of $150 will cover the adoption of two kittens under five months old, if adopted as a pair.
Woods Humane Society, which has experienced a “third wave” of kitten season on the Central Coast, hopes the event will help increase awareness about the number of kittens in need of homes. According to Emily L’Heureux, Woods’ CEO, since May, the shelter has facilitated 262 kitten adoptions and has more than 20 kittens currently available. An additional 71 kittens are in foster care and waiting to be placed for adoption.
“We hope this weekend’s event helps increase awareness about kittens in need of homes, reduce barriers to adoption, and encourage locals to consider adopting kittens in pairs,” L’Heureux said. She added that kittens adopted as pairs benefit from companionship, socialization, and transitioning into new environments, which is also a win for adopters, as it brings “double the love, affection, and joy into their homes.”
All kittens available for adoption at Woods Humane Society have been spayed or neutered, vaccinated, microchipped, licensed, and treated for parasites. Adoptions also come with 30 days of voluntary pet insurance and a free wellness exam at a local veterinary clinic.
Woods Humane Society has two locations: 875 Oklahoma Ave. in San Luis Obispo and 2300 Ramona Rd. in Atascadero. Both locations are open to the public daily from 12-5 p.m., with adoption hours from 12-4 p.m. More information is available at WoodsHumane.org or by calling (805) 543-9316.
About Woods Humane Society
Founded in 1955, Woods Humane Society is a non-profit animal shelter and welfare organization that annually places up to 3,000 dogs and cats into homes. All animals are spayed or neutered, vaccinated, and microchipped prior to adoption. Visit woodshumane.org for more information.

author: Heraldo de Aragón
title: Marea Roja en Venecia
text:
baloncesto
Marea Roja en Venecia
La preciosa ciudad que se hunde en la laguna fue inundada este jueves por un Casademont Zaragoza que ganó con holgura junto al Adriático
No fue el ‘acqua alta’, las mareas altas que sacuden la laguna sobre la que se levanta Venecia, sino la Marea Roja llegada desde Zaragoza. El ‘acqua alta’ inunda las zonas más bajas de la ciudad, con la Plaza de San Marcos como icónica muestra del fenómeno en una urbe que en un siglo advierten que puede ahogarse bajo las aguas. No fue en la Plaza de San Marcos, decía, sino en el Palasport Taliercio donde el Casademont Zaragoza abrochó su clasificación para el ‘play-in’ de la Euroliga Femenina. Incluso si la cosa saliera o saliese bien en las dos últimas jornadas ante el Valencia y el Praga, hasta podríamos clasificarnos para la Final a Seis de la máxima competición continental sin pasar por el peaje del ‘play-in’. Resultado al margen (39-44), la trascendencia de la victoria es enorme.
